languagesList: 🌍 Choose your interface language. This is not the audio language — it will be detected automatically.
technicalIssue:
⚠️
We have temporary technical difficulties.
We are already working on fixing it.
startLanguageSet: Welcome! I'm a bot that converts audio and voice messages into text. Just send a voice message or an audio file — I'll transcribe it and send you the text.
transcribeStart: Please wait while we process your audio file. This will take a couple of minutes!
transcribeFileReceived: 📁 File received! 🎵 Name: {fileName} ⏱ Duration: {duration} ⏳ Your file has been added to the processing queue. Transcription will be performed as soon as the queue allows. Processing time depends on file duration and current server load. We will send you a message when everything is ready.
unsupportedFormat: This audio format is not supported yet.
fileTooLarge: 📁 File too large! 📊 Your file size: {fileSize} MB ⚠️ Maximum size: {maxSize} MB 💡 What to do? • Split the file into parts under {maxSize} MB • Use audio editor (e.g., Audacity) • Compress file with lower bitrate 🛠 Recommended tools: 📱 Mobile: GarageBand (iOS), WaveEditor (Android) 💻 Desktop: Audacity (free) 🌐 Online: mp3cut.net, audiotrimmer.com
help: 🤖 AudioText AI Bot I convert audio and voice messages to text using Whisper AI technology. 📎 Supported formats: MP3, WAV, OGG, M4A, AAC, FLAC ⚡ How to use: Just send me an audio file or voice message! 🌍 Commands: /start - start working /help - this help /language - change interface language 📞 Support: @rlyAtas
